summary: Data Scientist and ML Engineer with 5+ years of experience building production ML systems. Expertise in NLP, computer vision, and MLOps. Proven track record of delivering high-impact AI solutions that drive business value.

highlights: Led the integration of Salesforce Einstein Prediction Builder into Enterprise Product Catalog (EPC) and Order Management workflows, enabling real-time predictive decisioning in live production systems.
Designed and owned ML inference pipelines using Integration Procedures and DataRaptors, orchestrating data preprocessing, model invocation, and downstream execution at enterprise scale.
Owned end-to-end production rollouts of ML-enabled features, including release validation, defect triage, and post-deployment stabilization in regulated enterprise environments.

Worked on enterprise Salesforce implementations for telecom client (Telefonica), integrating external systems via REST APIs to support large-scale data ingestion, order management, and AI-assisted decision workflows in production.
Built data transformation, orchestration, and validation logic using DataRaptors and Integration Procedures to support automated decision systems over large datasets.
